abstracttype.name: loghandler
abstracttype.description: Abstract type for a log handler.

sectiontype.name: base-loghandler
sectiontype.description: This provides the base attributes that every log handler must implement. This section type cannot be used directly as it does not return a HandlerFactory.

sectiontype.name: file
sectiontype.description: Log to a file. The name of the section is the filename of the log file.

sectiontype.name: syslog
sectiontype.description: Log to local syslog. The name of the section is the destination, which can be a hostname:port or a unix socket file name. Relative names are resolved relative to the directory containing the configuration file.

sectiontype.name: logging
sectiontype.description: This section contains the logging configuration.
